Panel.Text:
The 1 and 2 buttons represent your available actions. Green = Available / Red = Unvailable
Once both actions have been used, they will turn to "Not Ready", prompting you to draw an event card.
Draw an event, resolve it, then click on the button once you're done to "Ready" up for next round.
The section drawers containing crew members can be opened/closed with the right-hand side arrow button. You can put crew members there, it has 4 slots for Rank 1, 3 slots for Rank 2 and 2 slots for Rank 3 crew members.
